zone.line: These & corresponding conditions of
being are experienced principally
by those of the most delicate sensibility
-bility & the most enlarged imagination
& the state of mind produced by them
is at war with every base desire.
The enthusiasm of virtue love patriotism
-tism & friendship is essentially
linked with these emotions; & whilst
they last self appears as what
it is, an atom to a Universe.
Poets not are not only subject to these
emotio experiences as spirits of the
most refined organization, but they
can colour all that they combine
with the evanescent hues of this
aetherial world; a word of or a trait
in the representation of a scene or
a passion will touch the enchanted
chord, & reanimate, in those who
have ever experienced these emotions
